QuestData.Title: Vole's Voucher
QuestData.Description: <The voucher spells it all out, if you take the voucher to Au'narim at the Challenger's Promenade outside the Theater of Pain in Maldraxxus he should dispense the funds to you from Grandmaster Vole's credit.>
QuestData.LogDescription: Take the voucher to the Challenger's Promenade in Maldraxxus.
QuestData.QuestCompletionLog: Speak with the broker Au'narim at the Challenger's Promenade in Maldraxxus.
